The international Monetary Fund is warning that risks to the global financial system have grown in the past six months and the situation could get worse Michael Sullivan has more
The October two thousand Eighteen global financial stability report says the risks are still moderate what could increase significantly if a number of factors come into play including a broader rise and trade tensions and more political and policy uncertainty worldwide
